categories: Category:Star Wars: Darth Vader (2020) story arcs

nodes.text: Star Wars: Darth Vader: Dark Heart of the Sith

Star Wars: Darth Vader: Dark Heart of the Sith is the first story arc of Marvel Comics' 2020 series Star Wars: Darth Vader. The arc is written by Greg Pak and features art by Raffaele Ienco, the arc started on February 5, 2020, and ended on September 16, 2020.
